p: The suitability areas in all future climate scenarios for M. spinolai and M. gajardoi are shown in Figs. 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10, respectively. Tables 1 and 2 show in detail the stable, retraction and expansion areas in future scenarios, compared to the current potential distribution of M. spinolai and M. gajardoi, respectively.
